item.description:
Learn how to defend yourself in court
Pro se workshop, Saturday, March 6

Please set aside the date of March 6th, Saturday, for an all daypro se workshop sponsored by The Fatherhood Coalition. The workshop will help participants prepare to handle their own cases in court during and after the divorce process. Learn about court procedures (complaints and filings) and the players (clerk, judge, etc).

Plan to join us in Dorchester at St Mark's church hall from 9-5 p.m. on March 6.

The workshop is free of charge to CPF members (Membership signup) or for those
who commit to volunteer a couple of hours of their time in court support/watching
or similar activity . A cash donation of $20 in lieu of volunteer time is acceptable.

Register here: http://www.fatherhood...

More information: Contact Wayne Jewett, nuhusky82@aol.com, 774-254-5414

Directions to St. Mark's Church, 1725 Dorchester. Ave., Dorchester: http://www.mapquest.c...'s+Catholic+Church&city=Dorchester+Ctr&state=MA&address=1725+Dorchester+Ave&zipcode=02124&country=US&latitude=42.291323&longitude=-71.062739&geocode=ADDRESS&id=184269

group.name: Greater Boston Chapter of The Fatherhood Coalition

item.name: Pro se Seminar for Men and Fathers in Divorce
